author: Sabine Hossenfelder
description:
Want to restore the planet’s ecosystems and see your impact in monthly videos? The first 200 people to join Planet Wild with my code SABINE4 will get the first month for free at https://planetwild.com/r/sabinehossenfelder/join/4

Want to see them in action? Check out one of their latest missions—fighting deforestation in Madagascar with local communities leading the charge https://planetwild.com/r/sabinehossenfelder/m24/4

Recently, finance and insurance experts have begun warning that climate change might spell the end of capitalism as we know it. Blind alarmism or reasonable fear? Let’s take a look.

🤓 Check out my new quiz app ➜  http://quizwithit.com/ 
💌 Support me on Donorbox ➜ https://donorbox.org/swtg
📝 Transcripts and written news on Substack ➜ https://sciencewtg.substack.com/
👉 Transcript with links to references on Patreon ➜ https://www.patreon.com/Sabine
📩 Free weekly science newsletter  ➜ https://sabinehossenfelder.com/newsletter/
👂 Audio only podcast ➜  https://open.spoti
title: Climate Change Can Destroy Capitalism, Finance Experts Warn
